x_symbol.description: Insert a new rule into a styleSheet.

par.name: ss
par.note: StyleSheet object or an id string.

par.name: rule
par.note: String - The CSS rule for sel. Do not include the '{' and '}'.

par.name: idx
par.note: Integer - Indicates where the rule will be inserted in ss. If -1 the rule is appended to the end.

x_symbol.return: True on success, false on error.

comment.author: mf

rev.author: mf
rev.note: If idx is -1 the rule is appended to the end.
